fulltext:
KHANH TRAN MINH 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Name:  
KHANH TRAN MINH 
Date of Birth:  
Aug – 15 – 92 
Address:  
Tan Thuan Tay Ward, Dis.7, HCMC 
Mobile:  
0909 693 9494 
Email:  
khakhanh2000@gmail.com 
Website:  
https://www.linkedin.com/in/khanh-tran-minh-597651132/  
Relationship:  
Not Married 
PROFILE 
I am an enterprising young professional intending to develop my career as a Head of Commerce. In 
terms of results and objectives, I am working with enthusiasm and conviction 
With a smile, I have a proactive attitude with a willingness in studying new knowledge and soft skills, 
engaging with people and taking up new challenges in technical and management assignment. 
EDUCATION 
2013 – 2015 
Bachelor of Business Management 
UEH - University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City 
• Thesis: Business Plan for Lazada in 2015 – 2017 
• Average points: 7.0/10 
2010 – 2013 
Bachelor of Business Management 
HCE – Ho Chi Minh City College of Economics 
• Thesis: Business Plan for BinhDong Wheat Flour 2013 – 2015 
• Average point: 7.2/10 (Good Classification) 
PROFESSTIONAL EXPERIENCE 
10/2018 – Now 
Urban City – Head of Ecommerce 
Responsible for the growth of Brands from Trading & Branding side in VN 
• Commercial: Handling the growth of Ecommerce for both trading & 
branding 
• Merchandising: Monitor all the platforms visibility  
• Marketing: Managing the traffics with all marketing channels 
4 – 10/2018 
Lazada Global – Category Manager 
Responsible for the growth of Cross-border & Global Collection in Vietnam market 
• Commercial: Handling the growth of all categories (Assortment choosing, 
Deal picking & fundamentals document & translation) 
• Merchandising: Managing layout page & gain more visibility with intra 
campaign  
• Marketing: Creating campaigns & participating company campaigns 
4/2017 – 4/2018 Lazada Key Account Manager – Electronics Accessories 
Responsible for the growth of key sellers and brands in Accessories Marketplace 
• Handling all the Accessories of Electronics big sellers and brands 
• Supporting the team with data and merchandising campaign 
• Supporting the Category manager in charge of the growth of the CAT 
11/2015 – 2017 
Lazada Key Account Manager – EL Computers & Laptops 
Responsible for the growth of key sellers and brands in Computer & Laptops 
Marketplace with 3 Main KPIs 
• Supporting the grow of big seller and main accounts to reach the target on 
revenue monthly 
• Growing more than 7 sellers with 20k/month 
• Supporting the whole team with data and merchandising on campaign and 
boosting new products 
2015 
English Center Teacher & Manager 
• Teaching elementary and pre-intermediate level classes 
• Working as a general manager of acedemic environment 
2014  Marketer 
• Finding & Planning the best Marketing Solutions for Arts Gallery & Sales 
supporting 
SKILLS 
- 
Language:  
o Vietnamese: 8.5/10 
o English: 7/10 
o Chinese: 4/10 
- 
Communication: 7.5/10 
o Experience at work as well as outside activities has improved my ability to communicate 
with people more effectively and closely. The most importance of commucating is 
listening to people and understanding their demands 
- 
Planing & Organizing & Time Management:  
o Targeting and Planning for my social and professional life  
o Organizing the timeline and resources for activities 
o Tracking performance versus the objectives 
- 
Proficiency in Computer usage (Microsoft, Google, SQL, Qliksense) 
ACTIVITIES & ADDITIONAL INFORMATION 
2015 
Vietnam Youth Network Founder 
TDH Germany – South East Asian Youth Group 
2014 
Soft Skill Trainer 
HCMC Child Welfare Foundation 
2012 
Voluntary English & Chinese TA 
Cau Han Project – HCMC 
2007 
Main Secretary 
Vietnam Youth Group in high school 
REFERENCES 
Mr. Eric Lu Dinh Huy – Senior Manager – Lazada VN Crossborder - +84 90 200 8002 
Mr. Thien Da Huynh – Commercial Strategy Manager, Lazada Vietnam - +84 93 201 0692 
Mr. Dang Hoang Minh – Strategic Partnership Executive, Lazada Vietnam - +84 128 6161 662
